name: Rolagemix
description:
A tactical classic board game that is all about conquering the middle square with the crown.

  • The playing stone can only be moved to the last possible square in the chosen direction.
  • Outside of the marked centre square, it is possible to move the stone in an L-shape (like a knight in chess).
  • The playing stone can be dragged from the full corner to the opposite corner diagonally if there is an empty square.

The object of the game is to control the centre of the board. Thus, the first player to control the center square with the crown wins.

The stones can also be shuffled randomly in any part of the game.
You can choose between 3 levels of intelligence.

The game also allows a game between two human opponents or for practice moves.
